name: I Wanna Date U But You're a Monster
name_original: I Wanna Date U But You're a Monster
description:
My game for the Mix and Jam Jam 2020. This was my first jam working as a solo-developer. I had to code, draw , make the animations, make the music... etc.

I mixed the genres "Dating game" and "Puzzle". The result is a game where the player must find the perfect answer (which it's a solid object) and give it to their date. There are three posible answers in each puzzle.

At the present time, there is one level with 7 puzzles and 6 posible endings. 

Maybe, in the future, we'll see more levels and improvements.

Would you join Terreza the monster on hers dates?
